info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:41PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, west central Warren and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1041 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wells to 9 miles southwest of Sacandaga Campground. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Sacandaga Campground, Harrisburg, Hope, Benson, Gilmantown, Girards Sugarbush, Hope Falls, Tenantville, Blackbridge, Bakertown, Whitehouse, Maple Grove, Griffin and Upper Benson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
